item.label: Increased placer effort in detail placement and post-placement optimization.
Wirelength-driven placement of RAM and DSP blocks.
Defer detailed placement of RAMB and DSP blocks to the final stages of placement.
Increases estimated delay of high fanout and long-distance nets. High pessimism option
Increases estimated delay of high fanout and long-distance nets. Medium pessimism option
Increases estimated delay of high fanout and long-distance nets. Low pessimism option
Distribute logic across the device - highest level of distribution.
Distribute logic across the device - medium level of distribution.
Distribute logic across the device - lowest level of distribution.
Increased placer effort in post-placement optimization.
Use an alternate algorithm for timing-driven partitioning across SLRs.
Partition across SLRs and allocate extra area for regions of higher connectivity.
Partition across SLRs while attempting to balance SLLs between SLRs.
Partition across SLRs to balance number of cells between SLRs.
Direct the placer to attempt to place logic closer together in each SLR.
Run fewest iterations, trade higher design performance for faster run time
Fastest runtime, non-timing-driven, performs the minimum required placement for the design.

parameter.label: Skip pre-optimization
parameter.tooltip: Do not run pre optimization TCL commands

parameter.label: Skip place
parameter.tooltip: Do not run place_design

parameter.label: Skip snapshot save
parameter.tooltip: Do not create snapshot after placement

parameter.label: Parse warnings
parameter.tooltip: Parse warning messages

parameter.label: Parse info
parameter.tooltip: Parse info messages

parameter.label: Grep filter
parameter.tooltip: Calculated grep filter

parameter.label: Pre-placement TCL commands
parameter.tooltip: TCL commands to run before place_design

parameter.label: Directive
parameter.tooltip: Placement algorithm mode (not compatible with other specific options)

parameter.label: No timing-driven
parameter.tooltip: Disables the default timing driven placement algorithm.

parameter.label: Unplace
parameter.tooltip: Unplace all the instances which are not locked by constraints.

parameter.label: Post-placement
parameter.tooltip: Run optimization after placement to improve critical path timing.

parameter.label: Quiet
parameter.tooltip: Ignore errors, return TCL_OK in any case

parameter.label: Verbose
parameter.tooltip: Temporarily override message limits set with set_msg_config

parameter.label: Errors
parameter.tooltip: Regular expression for error messages

parameter.label: Warnings
parameter.tooltip: Regular expression for warnings messages

parameter.label: Info
parameter.tooltip: Regular expression for info messages

parameter.label: No-file problems
parameter.tooltip: Report problems that do not specify particular source file/line

parameter.label: Drc
parameter.tooltip: Enable problems with [Drc to be reported

parameter.label: Memdata
parameter.tooltip: Enable problems with [Memdata to be reported

parameter.label: Netlist
parameter.tooltip: Enable problems with [Netlist to be reported

parameter.label: Opt
parameter.tooltip: Enable problems with [Opt to be reported

parameter.label: Project
parameter.tooltip: Enable problems with [Project to be reported

parameter.label: Timing
parameter.tooltip: Enable problems with [Timing to be reported

parameter.label: Pwropt
parameter.tooltip: Enable problems with [Pwropt to be reported

parameter.label: Vivado_Tcl
parameter.tooltip: Enable problems with [Vivado_Tcl to be reported

parameter.label: Other problems
parameter.tooltip: Other problem patterns (after opening '[') to be suppressed)

output.line:
"cd ~/%VivadoProjectRoot
" "set outputDir ~/%VivadoProjectRoot/%VivadoRemoteDir
" "file mkdir $outputDir
"
"%PreOptTCL
"
"puts "No pre-optimization TCL commands specified"
"'
"place_design" "%directive_place" "%no_timing_driven" "%unplace" "%post_place_opt" "%quiet_place" "%verbose_place" "
"
"puts "@@FINISH@@"
"
